title: Add creator credit to footer

requirements.text: Add 'Made by Akshita Tiwari' credit text in the Layout component footer section

quotes: And in the footer, made by akshita tiwari

acceptanceCriteria: The footer in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx displays 'Made by Akshita Tiwari' text
The credit text is styled consistently with the existing footer design
The credit appears on all pages that use the Layout component

nonGoals: Changing the existing caffeine.ai attribution in the footer
Modifying footer layout or styling beyond adding the credit text
Adding links or additional information to the credit
